name: Pixel Punch v0.00005
description:
This game is about the amazing adventures of Bob as he fulfills his life purpose by fighting bad guys!

only problem is, that the lazy developer haven't added them.. yet! (don't get your hopes up though).

With a soundtrack of 3 amazing (or bad) songs you can DANCE AND PLAY AT THE SAME TIME.

Hope you can enjoy this just a tad bit and I'm happy

-Jonas

Ps. this is not nearly finished if you were wondering :P
